text.tspan: Sovereign states as identified by Butcher and Griffiths (2020), Correlates of War (2017), and Gleditsch and Ward
Data source: Gleditsch and Ward (2007); Correlates of War - State System Membership (2017); Butcher and Griffiths (2020)
